author: rocket_james
content: Hey guys, I wonder whats your opinion is about that, did not want to ask this in eth2 since its not really dev related but currently there the topic is about how much should miner/validators get payed. But wouldn't it also hurt a bit if ETH gets too expensive if to little of it goes into circulation? Considering a lot will get burned with 1559. I guess since ETH is rather a "consumable" for the network. Wouldn't a ETH price too high slow down usage of the network? Or do I miss something there?
